article_metadata.description: To the Editor:In a letter that appeared on April 22, Irving Glater asked for my opinions about specific changes that I would like to see. Here are two.Americans would benefit from having a national health care system such as every other developed nation in the world has. Those systems cost much less than our broken “system”, deliver better results in terms of metrics such as longevity and lower rates of infant mortality, and provide health care for all of their citizens with a
